◆ WIFI_IPV4BYTE_TO_ULONG

#define WIFI_IPV4BYTE_TO_ULONG (   in_addr1,
  in_addr2,
  in_addr3,
  in_addr4 
)
Value:
(((uint32_t)in_addr1 & 0x000000FF) << 24) | (((uint32_t)in_addr2 & 0x000000FF) << 16) |\
(((uint32_t)in_addr3 & 0x000000FF) << 8) | (((uint32_t)in_addr4 & 0x000000FF))
